Cornered Strike.Name: Cornered Strike
Cornered Strike.Description: When backed into a corner, you bring out your best
Cornered Strike.Effect: Increase a basic stat 10% of your level if you are at less than half health

Colorblind Fighter.Name: Colorblind Fighter
Colorblind Fighter.Description: You find advantage where no one else can.
Colorblind Fighter.Effect: Gain weapon triange advantage equal to your skill level in neutral matchups

Fury.Name: Fury
Fury.Description: Channel aggression into power, at a cost.
Fury.Effect: Increase Total Stats by 10% of your level, but take 10% of your level in damage after every exchange

Practiced.Name: Practiced
Practiced.Description: Through long hours of determined training, actions come naturally.
Practiced.Effect: Abilities that have a SKILL% chance of activating have a 5% better chance of activating. This includes Great Skills

Janken Defense.Name: Janken Defense
Janken Defense.Description: You have really studied on how to mitigate your disadvantages
Janken Defense.Effect: Decrease your weapon level by your skill level for Losing weapon triangle effects.

Smite.Name: Smite
Smite.Description: When you come to push, you shove.
Smite.Effect: Requires Push. When you push, you may push your opponent back an additional number of squares equal to 5% of your level

Patience.Name: Patience
Patience.Description: You wait to let your opponent finish before taking your turn.
Patience.Effect: You have a DEX% chance to delay your riposte until after your opponents follow through attack, if they have one.

Weapon Mastery 3.Name: Weapon Mastery 3
Weapon Mastery 3.Description: Your Weild your weapon as an extension of yourself
Weapon Mastery 3.Effect: Increase your Critical chance when weilding the chosen weapon by 50% of your level.

Lunge.Name: Lunge
Lunge.Description: Strike from your maximum range, and draw yourself back to leave space.
Lunge.Effect: After declaring an attack, you may move one square back. You must be able to stand in that space, but you can ignore difficult terrain as part of that movement. This does not effect the space remaining to be spent if you also have the Ride skill.

Weapon Mastery 2.Name: Weapon Mastery 2
Weapon Mastery 2.Description: Your Weild your weapon as an extension of your body
Weapon Mastery 2.Effect: Increase your Might when weilding the chosen weapon by 10% of your level.

Pass.Name: Pass
Pass.Description: You effortlessly move through the battlefield, and people don't pose a barrier
Pass.Effect: You can move through spaces occupied by the enemy, although you can't end your turn there. You can also ignore the effects of Provoke if you Pass level is greater than or equal to their provoke level.

Swap.Name: Swap
Swap.Description: Through the motion of combat, you maneuver your opponent behind you
Swap.Effect: Requires either Push or Lunge. After declaring an attack, you may swap spaces with your opponent. You can ignore difficult terrain for this movement. This does not effect your movement remaining to be spent if you also have the ride skill.

Vantage.Name: Vantage
Vantage.Description: You control when you engage with your opponent. You strike on your terms
Vantage.Effect: You have a DEX% chance to trigger your Riposte before your opponet attacks.

Escutcheon.Name: Escutcheon
Escutcheon.Description: Properly shield yourself from your opponent, and grealy decrease their potency
Escutcheon.Effect: You have a DEX% change to reduce your opponent's Magical Damage by half.

Provoke.Name: Provoke
Provoke.Description: You control the field around you, protecting your allies by making yourself a target
Provoke.Effect: Leaving Tiles within range 1/1/1-2 of your character cost enemies an additional 1/2/2 points of movement. Up to 3 total points can be invested into this skill. Enemies can ignore this movement penalty if they are moving to attack you.

Controlled Strike.Name: Controlled Strike
Controlled Strike.Description: When you are in control of the situation, no one can stop you
Controlled Strike.Effect: Increase a basic stat by 10% of your level if you are at more than 70% HP

Resolute Bastion.Name: Resolute Bastion
Resolute Bastion.Effect: Increase Total DEX, WIS, CON by 10% of your level, but decrease Total STR, INT, SPD by the same amount

Rapturous Brutality.Name: Rapturous Brutality
Rapturous Brutality.Description: If they die before you, you win.
Rapturous Brutality.Effect: Increase Total STR, INT, SPD by 10% of your level, but decrease Total DEX, WIS, CON by the same amount

Weapon Mastery 1.Name: Weapon Mastery 1
Weapon Mastery 1.Description: Your Weild your weapon as an extension of your arm
Weapon Mastery 1.Effect: Increase your Accuracy when weilding the chosen weapon by your level.

Forsight.Name: Forsight
Forsight.Description: You can plan your moves to prevent presenting an opening
Forsight.Effect: You have an INT% chance to prevent your opponent's Riposte and Follow Through Riposte.

Buckler.Name: Buckler
Buckler.Description: Properly shield yourself from your opponent, and grealy decrease their potency
Buckler.Effect: You have a DEX% change to reduce your opponent's Physical Damage by half.

Bold.Name: Bold
Bold.Description: You stay engaged longer than your opponent expects you too, catching them off guard
Bold.Effect: You have a DEX% chance to trigger an additional Follow Through Attack, Regardless of Speed Difference.

Advance.Name: Advance
Advance.Description: In a fluid motion, you claim your opponent's Space
Advance.Effect: Requires Push. When you push, you may enter the space you are driving your opponent away from. You can ignore difficult terrain as part of that movement. This does not effect your movement remaining to be spent if you also have the ride skill.

Grit.Name: Grit
Grit.Description: You resist punishment, and hold your feet where others fall
Grit.Effect: In combat, if your opponent attacks multiple times in a row, reduce the damage of the second attack onward by 70%

Superiority.Name: Superiority
Superiority.Description: Use your Physicality to prevent your opponent from ever finding a superior position
Superiority.Effect: You have a STR% chance to prevent your opponent's Riposte and Follow Through Riposte.

Desperation.Name: Desperation
Desperation.Description: Sometimes, you need to hit them hard and fast, or else.
Desperation.Effect: You have a SPD% chance of having your "Follow Through Attacks" trigger before your enemy can Counter Attack or Follow Through Counter. You must have Follow Through Attacks for the ability to trigger.

Cautious.Name: Cautious
Cautious.Description: You hold yourself back, until you really need to engage.
Cautious.Effect: If combat initiates and you are over 50% health, Neither you nor your opponent can Follow Through Attack or Follow Through Riposte

Elegant Riposte.Name: Elegant Riposte
Elegant Riposte.Effect: Increase a basic stat by 10% of your level when riposting

Janken Mastery.Name: Janken Mastery
Janken Mastery.Description: You leverage your advantages if battle more than most are able
Janken Mastery.Effect: Increase your weapon level by your skill level for winning weapon triangle effects.

Hearty.Name: Hearty
Hearty.Description: You take pain and punishment well, and can resist even the mightiest of blows
Hearty.Effect: Increase Total HP by 20% of your Level

Drag.Name: Drag
Drag.Description: As you retreat, you pull your opponent into the void, leaving them exposed.
Drag.Effect: Requires Lunge. As you move away with your lunge action, you can move your opponent into the space you are leaving. They must be able to exist there normally, if that situation arises. this movement can ignore difficult terrain

Practiced Aggression.Name: Practiced Aggression
Practiced Aggression.Description: If you've gotta swing, you may as well make it a good one.
Practiced Aggression.Effect: Increase a basic stat by 10% of your level when attacking

Push.Name: Push
Push.Description: Drive your opponent back, giving you some breathing room
Push.Effect: After declaring an attack, you can move your opponent one square await from you. They must be able to stand in that space, but you can ignore difficult terrain as part of that movement.
